appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name.

appDescription.message:
Augmente web browsing experience using web annotations over Hypothes.is. Currently supported augmentations are:
- Augment web content using operations: Popup creates a popup window with the content of the text body and Linkage convert textual content in links.
- Purpose-based annotation: define your own purposes to conduct a guided anotation on the web.
More info at: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1q_i9UwmUTTMYA9YMRTR8QW6LsF9-qponVmq6FDK6Mhw/edit?usp=sharing

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button
